entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 6:58 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SSE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow or periods of rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
